    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2951</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making a Calendar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden eines Kalenders</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication d'un calendrier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo um calendário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare un calendario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή ενός ημερολογίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de un calendario</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online activity which teaches the days of the week, the months and how to make a calendar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calendar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weeks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">months</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interaktives Online-Dienst, das die Tage der 
Woche, die Monate unterrichtet und wie man einen Kalender bildet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne interactive qui enseigne 
les jours de la semaine, les mois et comment faire un calendrier</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha interativa que ensine os 
dias da semana, os meses e como fazer um calendário</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea interattiva che insegna i 
giorni della settimana, i mesi e come fare un calendario</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα που 
διδάσκει τις ημέρες της εβδομάδας, οι μήνες και πώς να κάνει 
ένα ημερολόγιο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea interactiva que enseña 
los días de la semana, los meses y cómo hacer un calendario</string>
          </description>
